appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: A translation popup tool to show online dictionary content (with anki support)
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

optTitle.description: label text for 'Title' on optipon page.

baTitle.description: option title on broswer action page.

baEnabled.description: label text for 'enabled' checkbox on broswer action page.

baHotkey.description: label text for 'Autosel. Hotkey' checkbox on broswer action page.

encn_Oxford.description: Dictionary name displayed in option page.
